Control Name: 6.6 Ensure that the 'log_lock_waits' database flag for Cloud SQL PostgreSQL instance is set to 'on'
Control Statement: Enabling the log_lock_waits flag for a PostgreSQL instance creates a log for any session waits that take longer than the alloted deadlock_timeout time to acquire a lock.
